name: Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans
description: Classic straight-leg jeans with a button fly. Made from premium denim with a timeless fit. Features the iconic Levi's red tab and leather patch. Perfect for everyday wear with a vintage-inspired look.

name: Patagonia Better Sweater Fleece Jacket
description: Warm and comfortable fleece jacket with a sweater-knit exterior. Features zippered handwarmer pockets and a full-zip front. Made from recycled polyester for sustainability. Perfect for outdoor activities and layering.

name: Nike Dri-FIT Training T-Shirt
description: Lightweight performance t-shirt with moisture-wicking technology. Features a crew neck and athletic fit. Made from breathable fabric that keeps you dry during workouts. Perfect for gym sessions and running.

name: Ralph Lauren Oxford Shirt
description: Classic button-down oxford shirt with a tailored fit. Features the iconic polo player logo and button-down collar. Made from premium cotton for comfort and durability. Perfect for business casual and smart casual occasions.

name: Lululemon Align High-Rise Leggings
description: Ultra-soft yoga leggings with a high-rise waistband. Features four-way stretch and sweat-wicking fabric. Designed for yoga and low-impact workouts. Buttery-soft Nulu fabric feels like second skin.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: Iconic sneakers featuring the largest Max Air unit yet. Provides exceptional cushioning and all-day comfort. Features breathable mesh upper and durable rubber outsole. Perfect for casual wear and light activities.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 22
description: Premium running shoes with responsive Boost cushioning. Features Primeknit upper for adaptive fit and Continental rubber outsole for superior grip. Designed for long-distance running and everyday comfort.

name: Clarks Desert Boot
description: Classic suede desert boots with crepe rubber sole. Features two-eyelet lacing and timeless silhouette. Made from premium suede leather. Perfect for smart casual occasions and everyday wear.

name: Vans Old Skool Classic
description: Iconic skate shoes with signature side stripe. Features canvas and suede upper with padded collar for comfort. Durable waffle outsole provides excellent grip. Perfect for skateboarding and casual wear.

name: Dr. Martens 1460 8-Eye Boot
description: Iconic leather boots with air-cushioned sole. Features yellow stitching and heel loop. Made from durable Smooth leather. Perfect for all-day wear with timeless style.

name: West Elm Mid-Century Modern Sofa
description: Stylish three-seater sofa with clean lines and tapered legs. Features kiln-dried hardwood frame and high-density foam cushions. Upholstered in durable performance velvet. Perfect for modern living rooms.

name: Pottery Barn Chunky Wool Jute Rug
description: Handwoven area rug combining wool and jute fibers. Features natural texture and neutral tones. Durable construction perfect for high-traffic areas. Adds warmth and style to any room.

name: CB2 Acrylic Waterfall Coffee Table
description: Modern transparent coffee table made from thick acrylic. Features seamless waterfall design and sturdy construction. Creates an illusion of space in smaller rooms. Perfect for contemporary interiors.

name: Crate & Barrel Linen Curtain Panels
description: Elegant curtain panels made from 100% Belgian linen. Features natural texture and light-filtering properties. Rod pocket and back tab hanging options. Adds sophistication to any window.

name: Anthropologie Tufted Velvet Throw Pillows
description: Luxurious throw pillows with hand-tufted details. Made from soft velvet with hidden zipper closure. Includes premium down-alternative insert. Perfect for adding texture and color to sofas and beds.

name: Restoration Hardware Cloud Modular Sofa
description: Ultra-plush modular sofa with deep seats and feather-down cushions. Features Belgian linen slipcover and solid hardwood frame. Customizable configuration for any space. Ultimate comfort and luxury.

name: Serena & Lily Hanging Rattan Chair
description: Bohemian hanging chair made from natural rattan. Features comfortable cushion and sturdy hanging hardware. Creates a cozy reading nook or accent piece. Perfect for indoor or covered outdoor spaces.

name: Rejuvenation Edison Bulb Pendant Light
description: Industrial-style pendant light with exposed Edison bulb. Features brass socket and fabric-wrapped cord. Adjustable height for versatile installation. Perfect for kitchen islands and dining areas.

name: Parachute Linen Duvet Cover Set
description: Premium duvet cover set made from European flax linen. Features button closure and interior ties. Gets softer with each wash. Includes duvet cover and two pillow shams.

name: Article Sven Charme Tan Sectional
description: Mid-century modern sectional with tufted cushions. Features full-grain leather upholstery and solid wood legs. Durable construction with timeless design. Perfect for spacious living rooms.
